Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I am excited to present our premium product to you, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to meet the highest standards of quality and performance. This exceptional item is valued at $1200000 to us due to its unique features, unparalleled craftsmanship, and the benefits it offers to those who use it. Considering its exceptional value, we are offering you the opportunity to acquire this product at an exclusive price. We believe that this investment could greatly benefit you, enhancing your capabilities or adding significant value to your existing endeavors. If you're interested in learning more about how this product can be tailored to meet your specific needs, please let me know. We look forward to the possibility of working with you and bringing this remarkable product into your possession. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $1,200,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $1,200,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $1,000,000
